result.eng: The contract should be looked at closely again.
result.ga: Ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arís
result.orig: Ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arís
result.html: Ba cheart amharc go géar ar an chonradh arísThe contract should be looked at closely again.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart aṁarc go géar ar an ċonraḋ arísThe contract should be looked at closely again.

result.html: Gearradh pionós géar orthuThey were punished harshly.
result.ponchtml: Gearraḋ pionós géar orṫuThey were punished harshly.

result.eng: I usually listen very hard at these lectures.
result.ga: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seo
result.orig: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seo
result.html: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seoI usually listen very hard at these lectures.
result.ponchtml: Is gnáċ dom éisteaċt go géar ag na léaċtaí seoI usually listen very hard at these lectures.

result.eng: But competition between the suppliers was fierce and the profits were narrow.
result.ga: Ach bhí an comórtas géar idir na soláthróirí agus bhí na brabaigh caol
result.orig: Ach bhí an comórtas géar idir na soláthróirí agus bhí na brabaigh caol
result.html: Ach bhí an comórtas géar idir na soláthróirí agus bhí na brabaigh caolBut competition between the suppliers was fierce and the profits were narrow.
result.ponchtml: Aċ ḃí an comórtas géar idir na soláṫróirí agus ḃí na brabaiġ caolBut competition between the suppliers was fierce and the profits were narrow.
